column4: Guys on vnc4server, why cant I see my desktop only a console?
Who knows somethng about vnc here?
Guys, what should I use to remotly see my desktop linux  to linux ( I need something like vnc )
There's an extension to VNC that allows :0 to serve as a VNC server. xfb0server I think it's called.
Don't listen to me. _jason was correct. Just System / Preferences / Remote Desktop and turn it on.
